name: Jewish Vocational Services
description: Jewish Vocational Service (JVS) transforms lives by helping people build skills and find work to achieve self-sufficiency. JVS helps people find good, living wage jobs through their programs that focus on industries that are hiring and can offer career path jobs, such as healthcare, financial services, technology and trades. In partnership with Bay Area employers, JVS has developed Career Pathway programs to connect people to in-demand skills, paid work experience and robust job search skills. T
